mapper.select: select member_id, i.inqb_id, i.inqb_title , i.inqb_content, a.ansb_id, a.ansb_title, a.ansb_content from tbl_inquireboard i left join tbl_answerboard a on i.inqb_id =a.inqb_id where member_id = #{memberId} order by inqb_id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount};

select i.inqb_id, i.inqb_title , i.inqb_content, m.member_identification, i.inqb_complete, i.inqb_date from tbl_inquireboard i join tbl_member m on i.member_id =m.member_id order by inqb_id desc limit #{offset}, #{rowCount};
select i.inqb_id, a.ansb_id, a.ansb_title, a.ansb_content,a.ansb_date from tbl_answerboard a join tbl_inquireboard i on a.inqb_id= i.inqb_id and i.inqb_id = #{inqbId}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_answerboard (ansb_id, inqb_id, ansb_title, ansb_content) values (#{ansbId}, #{inqbId},#{ansbTitle}, #{ansbContent})
